title: 2-year-old 'serious' after shooting
content: A 2-year-old was shot while walking a dog at about 10:15 a.m. today near Chadwick Drive and Richfield Lane in southeast Fort Wayne's Crown Colony subdivision. According to police scanner traffic, the 2-year-old was walking a dog with a family member when the shooting took place. The child, who has not been identified as a male or female, was taken to a home in the 7000 block of Chadwick Drive before being transported to the hospital in serious to critical condition. The child's condition was upgraded at the hospital, Fort Wayne Police said at the scene. Neighbors who were driving or jogging in the neighborhood said they did not hear gunshots. Police officers were canvassing the neighborhood along Richfield Lane to find out details regarding the shooting. The shooting remains under investigation.
